mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.movieTitle, m.movieGenre, m.movieTime, m.moviePosterUrl FROM review r INNER JOIN movie m ON r.movieIdx = m.movieIdx WHERE r.userIdx = #{id} AND r.reviewStatus = 0;
SELECT f.movieIdx, m.movieTitle, m.movieGenre, m.movieTime, m.moviePosterUrl FROM favoritemovie f INNER JOIN movie m ON f.movieIdx = m.movieIdx WHERE f.userIdx = #{id} ;
